thread.title: BRIEF-Card Factory says ‍total year-to-date sales growth of 5.9 pct​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Card Factory says ‍total year-to-date sales growth of 5.9 pct​
text:
Jan 11 (Reuters) - Card Factory Plc:
* ‍TOTAL YEAR-TO-DATE SALES GROWTH OF 5.9% (11 MONTHS ENDED 31 DECEMBER 2016: +4.3%)​
* ‍YEAR-TO-DATE LIKE-FOR-LIKE STORE SALES GROWTH OF 2.7%​ * ‍EXPECTED UNDERLYING EBITDA FOR YEAR TO BE IN RANGE £93.0-£95.0M​
* ‍ANTICIPATE THAT COMBINED IMPACT OF FOREIGN EXCHANGE AND WAGE INFLATION IN FY19 WILL RESULT IN £7-8M OF ADDITIONAL COSTS​ Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
